if [ ! -f models/Phi-3.5-mini-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/Phi-3.5-mini-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf "https://huggingface.co/bartowski/Phi-3.5-mini-instruct-GGUF/resolve/main/Phi-3.5-mini-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf"
else
    echo "Model already exist."
fi

if [ -f "output.txt" ]; then
    cat output.txt
else
    echo "Error: output.txt does not exist."
fi
